A project of Mythical Robotics
& FRC team 2491 No Mythic

Welcome to Mythical Robotics' Lego Camp Toolkit!

With our resources, we hope that you will be able to successfully run a Lego robotics summer day camp for elementary and middle school students as a fundraiser for your team. Head to our about page to learn more about what we offer and how to get started.
